１時の方向より敵影！\n１５秒後に接敵！:
Enemy shadows from one o'clock!
Fifteen seconds to engage!
待って、予想より敵機の数が少ないわ。\n伏兵に注意しないと。:
Wait, there aren't as many enemy aircraft as I expected.
We have to watch out for an ambush.
後方支援は私の役目。\n気にせず行って大丈夫よ。:
Logistic support is my role.
Don't worry about it. You can go.
あっあっあっ……ううう、い、行きま～す！: Ah, ah, ah... Ugh, I-I'm going!
カラフルブーケの皆も頑張ってるみたいだな。: Looks like everyone in the colorful bouquet is working hard, too.
（……こうしてみていて、見事な連携だな。\n柊校舎のエースチームは伊達じゃないっ:
(...Looking at them like this, their coordination is impressive.
So the ace team in the Hiiragi building isn't just for show.)
（それぞれの連携も理解したうえできちんとこなせている。\nこれは俺も参考にさせて:
(They understand each other's coordination and are able to handle it properly.
I need to use this as a reference, too.)
（……あっ、あそこにいるのって、%usernameusernameuserna%:
(...Ah, is that %usernameusernameuserna% over there?)
Looks like you're here to observe our training.)
ようし……もっと前に出るわ！\nここは私に任せて頂戴！:
All right... I'll step forward!
Leave this to me!
あ……っ、クララさん、\n急に連携を外れないで！:
Ah... Clara,
Don't suddenly break up with me!
さあ、あいつに私の実力を見せてやるわ！\nとりゃー！:
Come on, let's show him what I can do!
Toryaaa!
ふふん、見てた、%usernameusernameuserna%？\n私のすっご:
Hehe, were you watching, %usernameusernameuserna%?
My amazing performance!
どう？ 私もなかなかやるでしょ？: What do you think? I'm pretty good too, aren't I?
（自信満々なクララには悪いが……\nここはちゃんと忠告しておかないとな）:
(I feel bad for Clara, who seems so confident, but...)
I'll have to give her a proper warning.)
……どんなに活躍したとしても、連携を崩すのは良くないだろ。: ...No matter how active you are, it's not good to lose your coordination.
や、やっちゃった……みんなに謝らないと！: I-I did it... I have to apologize to everyone!
ああ、そうするといい。: Yeah, go ahead and do that.
い、言われなくたって分かってるわよ！\n今から謝るんだから！:
Y-You don't have to tell me! I know!
I'm going to apologize now!
みんな、ごめんなさい！\n私、勝手に前へ出て陣形を崩しちゃって……！:
I'm sorry, everyone!
I stepped forward on my own and broke formation...!
まあ、集中力が高いことは良いことだが……\nちゃんと周囲にも気を配るんだぞ。:
Well, it's good that you're so focused, but...
Make sure you keep an eye on your surroundings.
そうね。\nまあ反省はしているみたいだし、今度からは気を付けてね。:
That's right.
Well, you seem to be reflecting on your actions, so be careful next time.
いざとなったらフォローするのがチームだから、\n気負いすぎなくてもいいからね。:
If it came down to it, the team would follow up, so...
You don't have to get too worked up.
……あんな風に前に出るなんて、尊敬します……: ...I respect you for stepping forward like that...
本当にごめんなさい！ もう、同じようなミスはしないから！\nはぁ……やっちゃった:
I'm really sorry! I won't make the same mistake again!
*sigh*... I did it...
（みんなは許してくれているが……クララは気にしてるみたいだな。\nちょっとくらい:
(Everyone is forgiving me, but... Clara seems to be worried about me.)
Maybe I should follow up a little.)
ミスは誰にでもあるものだ。\n同じ失敗をしなければ大丈夫だ。:
Everyone makes mistakes.
As long as you don't make the same mistake, you'll be fine.
そ、そうじゃないわ！\n別に%usernameusernameuserna%が間:
Th-That's not it!
It's not like %usernameusernameuserna% is wrong...!
というか、そういう言い方されたら、何も言えないじゃないの……！: Actually, if you put it like that, I can't say anything...!
（口では色々言いながら、こっちをにらむのを止めないな……）: (She's saying a lot of things, but she won't stop glaring at me...)
（……まあ、多少時間がたてば落ち着くだろう）: (...Well, I'm sure she'll calm down after a little time.)
全員、あと最低５周だ！\nそれが終わればランニングは好きなタイミングで切り上げて:
Everyone, at least five more laps!
Once you're done, you can stop running at any time you want!
まあ、適当に流しておくわね。: Well, I'll just brush it off.
（ちゃんと全員の体力を考えた上で回数をコントロールしているのか。\nその上で、自:
(Is she controlling the number of times, considering everyone's stamina?
On top of that, she's saying that she'll be able to train on her own.)
（こうして他人が頑張っている姿を見ていると、\n俺も頑張らないとって気持ちになる:
(When I see other people working hard like this,
I feel like I have to do my best too...!)
%usernameusernameuserna%も、\n私達を気にせず適度なタイ:
%usernameusernameuserna%, too,
You don't have to worry about us. You can stop at just the right time, okay?
ああ、気を使ってくれてありがとう。\nでも、もう少し走れそうだから頑張らせてもら:
Yeah, thanks for being so considerate.
But it looks like I can run a little longer, so I'll do my best.
……はっ、はあっ、はっ……私は、まだ走れるわ。\n%usernameuserna:
...Hah, hah, ha... I can still run.
%usernameusernameuserna% is still running...
……クララ、別に俺と並んで走り続ける必要はないんだぞ？\nみんなみたいに、適当な:
...Clara, you don't have to keep running alongside me, you know?
Just like everyone else, if I end things at the appropriate time...
べ、別に%usernameusernameuserna%と張り合ってなんかいない: I-It's not like I'm competing with %usernameusernameuserna%.
まだまだ、走りたい気分なだけ。\nそっちこそ、そろそろ休んだらどうなの？:
I'm just still in the mood to run.
Why don't you get some rest?
（クララがそういうなら、好きにさせておくか……）: (If Clara's like that, then I guess I'll just let her do as she pleases...)
（まだクララは俺の隣を走り続けてるな……\nだけど、さっきよりずっと限界が近そう:
(Clara's still running next to me...)
But it looks like I'm much closer to my limit than before.)
クララ、無理をしない方がいいと思うぞ。: Clara, don't push yourself too hard.
はぁ！？\nむ……無理、なんて……して、ないけど……！:
Huh?!
I... I'm not... forcing myself, but...!
（まだそんな強がりを言って……）: (He's still putting on a brave face...)
無理をしてこの後の訓練に響いたら、困るんじゃないか？: If you push yourself too hard and it affects your training after this, you'll be in trouble, won't you?
（負けず嫌いなのはいいんだがなぁ……\nいつか、痛い目を見ないか心配になるな）:
(It's good that she hates to lose, but...)
I'm worried I'll get hurt someday.)
（ここで切り上げておくか。俺が走るのをやめたら、\nクララも意地を張って走る必要:
(I guess I'll end it here. If I stop running,
Clara probably won't have to be stubborn and run anymore, after all.)
（さて、休憩も終わったし午後からは何をするか……）: (Now that my break is over, what should I do this afternoon...?)
……ん？ 中庭に、誰かが倒れてる……！？\nだ、大丈夫か……って、クララ！？:
...Hm? Someone's lying in the courtyard...!?
A-Are you okay...? Wait, Clara?!
（……俺と張り合ってかなり無理して走ってたからな。\n多分体力の限界が来たんだろ:
(...She was forcing herself to run because she was competing with me.
My stamina is probably at its limit.)
なんだか寝言を言ってるな……\nまさか、夢の中でも俺と競い合っているのか？:
She's talking in her sleep...
Don't tell me she's competing with me even in her dreams?
……このまま放置するのも悪い気がするし、\n起きるまでは見守っておくか。:
...I feel bad leaving her like this,
I guess I'll watch over her until she wakes up.
中庭でクララが眠っているのが見えたから、\n気になって起きるまで側にいたんだが。:
I saw Clara sleeping in the courtyard, so...
I was curious, so I stayed by her side until she woke up.
えっ！？ ね、寝顔まで見られちゃったの！？\nうぅ……！ ふ、不覚だわ……！:
Huh?! Y-You even saw my sleeping face?!
Ugh...! Th-That was a blunder...!
……落ち込んでるとこ悪いが、ちょっといいか？: ...Sorry to interrupt when you're feeling down, but do you have a moment?
そもそも、倒れ込んで寝るほど全力を出し続けるのは\nあまりほめられたことじゃない:
In the first place, it's hard to keep going at full strength to the point of collapsing and falling asleep
It's not much of a compliment, you know?
負けることに意味なんてないんだから、\n妥協するなんてありえないわ！:
There's no point in losing, after all
There's no way I'd compromise!
勝ち負けは手段のひとつでしかない。\n必要なのは……目的を達成できるかどうかだ。:
Winning and losing is just one means to an end.
What I need...is to see if I can achieve my goal.
例えばだけど……チーム戦で、クララがひとりで無理をして\n敵のエースに勝ったとし:
For example... In team battles, Clara pushed herself too hard on her own
Even if you beat the enemy ace, you can't let your comrades be defeated after that, right?
それは……うん、だめね。\nそんなの、絶対に避けなきゃいけないわ。:
That's...yeah, that's no good.
I have to avoid that at all costs.
ああ。だけど逆に、クララがエースを引き付けて負けたなら、\nクララ個人は負けたか:
Yeah. But on the other hand, if Clara attracted the ace and lost...
Clara personally might have lost.
……だが、その結果、エース以外をチームが倒して戦況を進められたら\nチームは勝利:
...But as a result, if a team other than Ace were to be defeated and the battle progressed
The team can win.
負けにだって価値がある負けがある。\nだから、そこにこだわるのは良くないってこと:
Even a loss has value.
That's why it's not good to get hung up on that.
休むのだって、重要な場面で勝つために大切なことなんだ。: Taking a break is also important in order to win in an important situation.
ああ。……まあ、あくまでも１例だけどな。: Yeah... Well, it's just one example.
それに、俺だってまだ実践できてるかといえばそうでもない。\nだが、参考までに覚え:
Besides, it's not like I'm still able to put it into practice.
But just for reference, please remember.
あっ、あっ、あっ……ど、どうしましょう……！: Ah, ah, ah... Wh-What should I do...?!
クララ、強引な突入は……: Clara, don't force your way in...
分かってる。あんな真似はもうしないわ。: I know. I won't do that again.
派手に動いて、私の方に敵を引きつけて……: They moved in a flashy way, drawing the enemy in my direction...
……今よ、クララさんが囮になってくれている間に、敵を！: ...Now, while Clara is acting as a decoy, the enemy!
ええ、あとは任せて！: Yes, leave the rest to me!
（……クララの動き、以前とは別物だな。\n独断専行がなくなったのは当然として……:
(...Clara's movements are different from before.
It's only natural that she's stopped acting arbitrarily...)
（自分を囮にして、仲間全体のために動けるようになるなんてな）: (I never thought I'd be able to use myself as a decoy and move for the sake of my friends as a whole.)
……やっぱり、クララは根が素直だからこそ、\nあんな風にすぐに成長して行動に反映:
...As I thought, it was precisely because Clara was so honest at heart
I wonder if she'll grow up like that soon enough and reflect on her actions.
（……っと、シミュレーションが終わったか。\n……クララが、こっちに向かってすご:
(...Oh, the simulation is over.
...Clara's running this way at an incredible speed.)
どうよ！\nあなたに出来ないことだって、私なら出来ちゃうんだから！:
What do you think?!
Even if you can't do it, I can do it!
この間言ったことをもう飲み込んで、\n自分のものにして動けるなんてそうそう簡単に:
She had already swallowed what she'd said the other day
It's not that easy to make something your own and move around.
ここまで動けるようになるためには、\nさぞかしたくさん練習したんだろうな。:
In order to be able to move this far,
She must have practiced a lot.
それに、今までの積み重ねがあるからこそ、ここまで動けたんだろう。\nやっぱりクラ:
Besides, it's probably because of all the time we've spent together that we're able to move this far.
I really do respect Clara's hardworking nature.
どうしたんだ？ まだまだ、ほめる場所があるんだが……: What's wrong? There's still a lot of places to praise...
……確かに無理してたかも？: ...Maybe I was pushing myself too hard?
いや、まだ褒めたりないな。: No, I haven't complimented her yet.
ほ、ほめすぎよ！\nもう、なんだか無理矢理ほめてるでしょ！:
Y-You're praising me too much!
Geez, you're forcing yourself to praise me!
……無理してたって何よ！？\nちゃんと褒めるなら褒め切りなさいよ！:
...What do you mean you were forcing yourself?!
If you're going to praise me properly, then praise me to the end!
だ、だからもういいって！\nそれ以上、ほめないでいいから！:
I-I told you, that's enough!
You don't have to praise me anymore!
（ほめてもほめなくても怒られるのか……難しいな）: (Whether I praise her or not, she'll get mad at me... That's hard.)
ちょ、ちょっと！ 何笑ってるのよ！？\nぜ、絶対にいつか吠え面かかせてやるんだか:
H-Hey! What are you laughing at?!
I-I'll definitely make you bark at me someday, so prepare yourself!
